column4: Zaehias: Can you access the router's web interface by surfing to 127.0.0.1 (or similar)?
(to see if the router is alive)
If the router works for other pcs/OSes it's fine I guess
Ah, no router? Got it. You should test it on another computer tho.
It works? Well, then it's in Linux.
Can anyone recommend a 3D game or demo that benchmarks my Ubuntu? :)
I can't believe google.com/linuxing for glxgears download gives me nothing !
That's not much of a demo. :P No huge maps, no textures with anisotropic etc...
Well, it's not much of a real world benchmark if it just tests poly fillrate...
modern gfx cards have pixelshaders, antialiasing quality levels, pixelpipe fx...
Yeah, I was thinking of installing some id games :) But I have to compile them, right?
yeah, I've heard about it... but DX support is not perfect yet, is it?
Wouldn't mind installing my Quake 3 - but do I really run it in cedega?
